snippet: Airmen taking their enlistment or officer appointment oaths can omit the words "so help me God" if they choose, Air Force officials announced Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: Air Force: 'So Help Me God' in Oath Is Optional
headline.main: Air Force: 'So Help Me God' in Oath Is Optional

lead_paragraph: Airmen taking their enlistment or officer appointment oaths can omit the words "so help me God" if they choose, Air Force officials announced Wednesday.
